channel.title: Tomorrow I'll undergo several inches of hair shortening
channel.description:
after a year of growing my hair out, i will have to cut it for my parents who i am living with and for internships, that includes buzzing my sideburns
damn i am NERVOUS about it
here is a pic of my current condition, hopefully after i shower the cut hair off i'll post the results [img]https://img14.imageshack.us/img14/3618/img0560qz.jpg[/img]

item.title: Tomorrow I'll undergo several inches of hair shortening
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
Maxey:

You look like a woman. Do a fucking buzz cut, like a man.

I feel like long hair is the epitome of manliness. Whenever we see a depiction of some great warrior or something, they always depict said person with like shoulder-length long hair.
